verbs.description: [ARG1: Eagles defensive end Chris Long] [V: was] [ARG2: critical of NFL commissioner Roger Goodell] [ARGM-TMP: while meeting the media after an OTA practice at the NovaCare Complex in Philadelphia , Pa. on Wednesday , June 6 , 2018 ( 6/6/18 )] .
